title: Poochaandi Paarvayila Lyrics Sattam Oru Iruttarai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Antony & Srilekha Parthasarathy
Lyrics : Annamalai
Song: Poochandi Paarvaiyil
Music: Vijay Antony

Un poochaandi paarvayila
aanen Soyin aaney Soyin
un theepatti kannaala naan
aanen doyin.. aaney doyin..

Nee thanganagai mazhigaya ?
unna adagu vaika allaaduren
nee nadamaadum saaraayama ?
unna parthadhumey thallaaduren

Hey iravana vidiyala
vidinjaalum theriyila
kodachal kodupa kanavula

hey veyil soodum theriyala
mazhai penjum nenaiyala
ennaku enna puriyala

Unna thalakaani naan aakuven
unmela thalavachi naan thoonguven
un pinnaala valaatuven
enna sonnaalum thalaiyatuven

hey nee thandha kissula
thallaadum kickula
iravaa pagalaa puriyala

hmm midnight time-ula
minsaara vettula
edhuku enna thaedura..

adi rusiyaana palagaaramey
en pasiyaara nee venumey

nee illaama nodi neramey
ini odaadhu kedikaaramey ..
